name: Hug of the Drunken Oni
statusOutcome: [AttackerName] de repente se lanza hacia adelante con los brazos [AttackerHisOrHer] se extiende de par en par y atrapa [TargetName] en un abrazo de oso apretado.Con una sonrisa juguetona [AttackerName] levanta [TargetName] del suelo y le da a [TargetHimOrHer] un beso descuidado mientras se endurece [AttackerName] poderoso.
statusMiss: [AttackerName] suddenly lunges forward with [AttackerHisOrHer] arms spread wide, but [TargetName] manage to avoid the Oni's grappling attempt!
restraintEscaped: [TargetName] manages get free of [AttackerName]'s tight hug!
restraintEscapedFail: But [TargetName] can't get free of [AttackerName]'s tight hug!
